reviewText: This movie had a great story line but I did not like the ending. The writer did not allow the viewer to find out what happend when the family made it to there new location.

This is  the best movie I've ever seen... This movies shows you about love that a woman has for a man who has aids...  they are great actors, and it will touch you in oneway or another....After seeing this movie i wanted to just go out find  someone with this disease to love....  I loved it and it will touch your heart...Get this movie you'll love it and cherish it... I promise you'll laugh and cry... and you'll always know that even if someone has this disease you could continue to love them, and know that aids doesn't stop one from loving each other,the man who played matthew was a wonderful actor, i feel inlove with him also  Khandi alexander was just awesome, PLEASE get this movie it is good! If your afraid of someone with aids get this movie and it will change the way you feel, it changed my heart FOREVER... so get this movie you'll be glad you did...WATCH IT !!! GREAT MOVIE

What could easily have been typical Hallmark mush is an extremely poignant, relevant, and entertaining film. An amazing debut. I can't wait to see more from these talented filmmakers. Finally, the DVD is available!
I'm glad this well written, well directed, and well acted movie is finally out on DVD.
